owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

USDCtoAlloyxBronze(uint256).notice: Convert USDC Amount to Alloyx Bronze

alloyxBronzeToUSDC(uint256).notice: Convert Alloyx Bronze to USDC amount

depositAlloyxBronzeTokens(uint256).notice: An Alloy token holder can deposit their tokens and redeem them for USDC

depositNFTToken(address,uint256).notice: A Junior token holder can deposit their NFT for stable coin

depositUSDCCoin(uint256).notice: A Liquidity Provider can deposit supported stable coins for Alloy Tokens

startVaultOperation().notice: Initialize by minting the alloy brown tokens to owner

userdoc.notice: Initial vault for AlloyX. This vault holds loan tokens generated on Goldfinch and emits AlloyTokens when a liquidity provider deposits supported stable coins.
